danga lachitsanzo: Gulu lazotsatira zonse zomwe zingatheke za kuyesa kwazotheka
pafupifupi: Chiwerengero cha misinkhu yogawidwa ndi chiwerengero cha zikhalidwe
kuyesera mwachisawawa: Njira yomwe zotsatira zake sizidziwika mpaka zitawonedwa
mwachisawawa: Imayendetsedwa ndi kapena kuphatikiza mwayi wofanana pa chinthu chilichonse
